revenue_performance.analysis: Revenue increased BECAUSE of strong performance in both concentrate and finished product operations, driven by recovery in away-from-home channels and strategic pricing initiatives.

management_guidance_audit: The management's discussion and analysis highlights the company's focus on strategic growth initiatives, cost management, and navigating macroeconomic challenges. The company aims to continue leveraging its brand strength and global reach to drive growth.
key_risks_evidence: Recoverability of Assets | Economic, political, and regulatory uncertainties in various regions may impact asset recoverability. | COCACOLA_2022_10K.pdf | 4d5f3eb5278449ea
Product Safety and Quality | Consumer concerns about ingredients and regulatory compliance may affect product perception. | COCACOLA_2021_10K.pdf | b708fce87cca2d7f
COVID-19 Impact | Ongoing pandemic effects may disrupt operations and affect financial performance. | COCACOLA_2021_10K.pdf | 24632fd3a7ed1f00
Sustainability Challenges | Increasing focus on sustainability may require significant changes in operations and supply chain. | COCACOLA_2022_10K.pdf | 59cd8baca168a768
Obesity Concerns | Growing health concerns about obesity may impact product demand and regulatory environment. | COCACOLA_2022_10K.pdf | cbed6fcd40d24475
